inputs.name: cloneServer
inputs.label: SQL Clone Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the SQL Clone Server Endpoint.

inputs.name: sourceInstance
inputs.label: Source instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: SQL Server to create the image from. This SQL Server instance must have already been added to the SQL Clone Server specified above.

inputs.name: sourceType
inputs.label: Source for image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether to create an image from a live SQL Server database or a SQL Server database backup.

inputs.name: sourceDatabase
inputs.label: Source database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Database to create an image from.

inputs.name: sourceFileNames
inputs.label: Full path to backup file(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: For striped and/or differential backup, seperate multiple file path with ;

inputs.name: imageLocation
inputs.label: Image location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SQL Clone image location to create the image on. This location must have already been added to the SQL Clone Server specified above.

inputs.name: modificationScriptFiles
inputs.label: Modification script(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: SQL scripts and Data Masker masking set file (Datamasker must be installed on the clone agent machine), seperate multiple file path with ;

inputs.name: teams
inputs.label: Team names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify names of teams that can access this image. If you're not using teams, leave this empty.

inputs.name: imageName
inputs.label: Image name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A name for the image. Build and Release variables can be used here.
